page.title: 05Wildlife Centre (continued)
page.content: {Camperdown Wildlife Centre}has many reasons to be proud of its achievements. Peraps the proudest moment came when the Centre became the first place to hatch a Golden eagle in captivity. They are also very proud of their Brown Bear, Jeremy. Jeremy is a twenty year old female (yes, female) who became famous as the Sugar Puffs bear in adverts on television some years ago. She also eats dead guinea pigs!! Mr Reid, the Ranger in charge of the Centre, gets very angry at the way some "fools" mistreat our wildlife, smashing eggs and so on,and sees his job as helping people to understand more about our wildlife. He also wants to help people to take a more responsible attitude towards animals. We agree with him.
